title: Reveal and Launch of Procreate Dreams
heading: Procreate Dreams: Crafting the Launch Experience
description: Designed the reveal and launch campaigns for Procreate Dreams, introducing an all-new animation tool from the makers of Procreate to a broader audience.

award.text: Winner of the 2024 Apple Design Award for Innovation

content.alt: Procreate Dreams hero image showing the app interface

content.title: The Challenge
text: The animation software market for iPad was already saturated with established players. We needed to differentiate Dreams not just through its features, but through a compelling narrative that would resonate with both professional animators and newcomers to the medium.
Our vision was to enter this space with a 'Bang!'. We built hype for a pre-order campaign and affirmed to users that the Procreate experience they know and love has entered the world of animation.

content.title: Pre-Launch Strategy
text: The countdown campaign served as a masterclass in building anticipation. We crafted save-the-date announcements that sparked curiosity without revealing too much, supported by a dynamic countdown website that subtly showcased Dreams' animation capabilities.

content.title: Live Reveal
text: The September 8th event at Playground London marked the culmination of our launch strategy. We designed an immersive experience that demonstrated Dreams' capabilities through commissioned artwork and live demonstrations, showcasing how the tool could serve both professional animators and those just beginning their animation journey.

content.title: Results
text: The launch exceeded our expectations with over 150k first-time downloads and more than 80k pre-orders. Our website saw close to 20k visits during the reveal and 63k visits on launch day. This success culminated in receiving the Apple Design Award for Innovation in 2024, recognizing our efforts to make professional animation tools more accessible.
